Know this  Dr PERIOD Puja Uppal Family Medicine PERIOD

Beyond the News Since the findings of this study are observational and not casual more research is going to be needed to scientifically confirm if morning exercise results in greater weight loss PERIOD Also keep in mind that the data cohort looked at moderatetovigorous physical activity MVPA and quantity of time versus time of day as the variables to study PERIOD



Key Drivers in Harrisonburg County

Researchers analyzed physical activity data from  adults in the NHANES survey from  PERIOD Participants were clustered into three groups based on the timing of their moderatetovigorous physical activity MVPA throughout the day morning  am  am midday  am1 pm and evening  pm  pm PERIOD

 minutes of MVPA exercise per week in the morning group was associated with lower a BMI PERIOD

Takeaway 

What theyre saying  Study Source



Health Standard Newswire Nothing wrong with a morning exercise routine PERIOD

All of these variables above play an important role in the outcomes of your overall health PERIOD
